rooms.name: Main Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that complies with Vastu by ensuring a welcoming and energy-positive flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open living space designed in the Brutalist style featuring raw concrete finishes and exposed structural elements. Placement ensures proper sunlight and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for family meals with appropriate natural light orientation and energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Dedicated guest room aligned according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen layout with a central position relative to dining and living areas, following Vastu recommendations for utility spaces.

openings.description: Main entry door positioned in the north-west zone ensuring optimal flow of energy and ease of access as per Vastu guidelines.
Large window providing abundant natural light while balancing energy distribution according to Vastu.
Dedicated two-car garage opening ensuring easy access from the ground floor.

additional_features.name: Garden Entrance
additional_features.description: A well-defined pathway to a large garden area designed for relaxation and energy balance in line with Vastu principles.
